lead_paragraph: The shareholders’ rejection of Hertz’s $1.46 billion takeover offer for Dollar Thrifty on Thursday cleared the way for a more lucrative deal of $1.53 billion with Avis.
snippet: The shareholders’ rejection of Hertz’s $1.46 billion takeover offer for Dollar Thrifty on Thursday cleared the way for a more lucrative deal of $1.53 billion with Avis.

headline.main: Dollar Thrifty Shareholders Vote Against Hertz Bid, Leaving Avis Standing
headline.seo: Dollar Thrifty Shareholders Vote Against Hertz Bid, Leaving Avis Standing
headline.print_headline: Dollar Thrifty Shareholders Vote Against Hertz Bid, Leaving Avis Standing
